column1: I'm from Florida,planning on driving up to Detroit Michigan. Are there any issues as far as mandatory lockdown?
Stay home. This is not a time to travel. Almost everything is closed.
Please stay home so the spread of COVID-19 stops. Detroit has a tsunami of COVID-19 cases.

Welcome to the Forums!Why are you making this trip? Are you coming home to Michigan because you're a snowbird? Do you have to make this trip for some other reason like a sick relative? Or do you just want to take a long drive?If it's the last reason then follow the advice in Reply #1. If it's something else, people will try to help.

To actually answer the question, the entire state of Michigan is under an executive order from the governor that is basically "shelter in place" like many other states. This currently runs through April 13th. All non-essential businesses are closed. Casinos, museums, parks and just about everything else are closed. Restaurants are carry out only. About the only things open are grocery and hardware stores. https:/â€¦00.html
tev, actually many parks are open. It's about the only outlet for recreation left. Maintain social distancing, of course.
